fields.value: Vocational Education [United States]:  Survey of Characteristics of Students in Noncollegiate Postsecondary Schools, 1976-1977

authorName.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value:
This survey was designed to collect data on students  currently enrolled in occupational programs in public and priv
ate  noncollegiate postsecondary schools in the United States. Data were  collected on the students' age, sex, racial/ethnic background, current  employment, future educational and employment plans, and parental background.

fields.value: Version Date: 2001-10-22Version Text: 2001-10-22 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: LRECL with SAS and SPSS data definition statements;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The codebook is provided as a Portable Document Format  (PDF) file. The PDF file format was developed by Adobe Systems  Incorporated and can be accessed using PDF reader software, such as  the Adobe Acrobat Reader. Information on how to obtain a copy of the Acrobat Reader is provided on the ICPSR Web site.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;

distributorName.value: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research

distributorAffiliation.value: Institute for Social Research, University of Michigan

value: Students attending occupational programs in public and private noncollegiate postsecondary schools in the United States.

fields.value: The sample of schools was chosen from the Postsecondary  Career School Survey.
